args:

tasks.label: run-container-torizon-debug-arm64
args: LOCAL_REGISTRY=${config:host_ip} TAG=arm64 GPU=${config:torizon_gpu} docker-compose up -d pwmc-debug

tasks.label: run-container-torizon-debug-arm
args: LOCAL_REGISTRY=${config:host_ip} TAG=arm GPU=${config:torizon_gpu} docker-compose up -d pwmc-debug

tasks.label: run-container-torizon-debug-amd64
args: LOCAL_REGISTRY=${config:host_ip} TAG=amd64 GPU=${config:torizon_gpu} docker-compose up -d pwmc-debug

tasks.label: run-container-torizon-debug-amd64
args: LOCAL_REGISTRY=${config:host_ip} TAG=amd64 GPU=${config:torizon_gpu} docker-compose up -d pwmc-debug

tasks.label: run-container-torizon-debug-riscv64
args: LOCAL_REGISTRY=${config:host_ip} TAG=riscv64 GPU=${config:torizon_gpu} docker-compose up -d pwmc-debug
